PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Because I am too lazy...
If you are SC trade, you want to do a big day 1 swap around the time you go for coil (since you'll be losing hella res), and at that point you want to ensure at least a flask gain belt, swap to ele flask setup from... coil also goes into Purity of Elements, dropping determ forever
pre late day 1
quick silver granite quartz life
boss swap
arca brand -> cascade
imo, you really want arca brand on right click rather than cremation so you can stop your own movement with right click even when no targetable corpse.
also pre flask + purity of elements swap, use brine king
dont forget about practical application
ashes is 15-20% more damage
min viability for swap from pconc -> dd at least one consuming dark (but this is lowkey troll) cremation of exhuming or dd chain or vd seething (but this is highkey shit compared to the other two)
Levelling Notes be looking for daggers, claws, swords. at least 2g Caustic - Mirage - CtP
Level 4 Puncture Buy Frostblink, War Banner, Sniper's Mark
Level 8 Take Faster Attacks
Level 10 Take Whirling Blades
level 12 pconc - ctp - volley BUY FLASKS
level 16 hoag, blood rage
level 18 ppad
level 24 haste, plague bearer, despair
